data.name: The Cold White
data.detailed_description:
Your fiance Alice and you are an archaeologist in Alaska. Alice ignored you and had an accident during hang gliding. When she reached you via radio, her last words were "They are real"... And no more news was heard. Who were these real ones or what? You have to get into this cold white world to find Alice and solve the mystery.

First of all, you must survive. You will get hungry, and you have to hunt. You have to build shelter by cutting trees in the dangerous wihte forest. And craft tools to survive. The real question is; where is your fiancee Alice and who or what are the things she mentions in her last words?

Key Features

  • Build shelter by cutting any trees in the dangerous white forest. Gather food and cook them with camp fire.
  • Explore and be careful. The Cold is your enemy, fight them or run away if you are weak.
  • Craft weapons and tools for survive.
  • Unravel the mystery. Track down the your fiance.

data.short_description: Your fiance Alice and you are an archaeologist in Alaska. Alice ignored you and had an accident during hang gliding. When she reached you via radio, her last words were "They are real"... You have to get into this cold white world to find Alice and solve the mystery.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Italian, Japanese, Danish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 550 GTX 2GB / AMD Radeon 7870 HD 2GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
